XenotypeDef.label: Romulenie
XenotypeDef.description: Cousins of the Vulcenie, the harsher environment and strife for self-betterment led to the Romulenie becoming cold, controlling and sadistic. What they lack in their cousin's natural ingenuity they more than make up for with their manipulative skills.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: An offshoot of Vulcenies, the Romulenie are cold and calculating, but lack their Vulcenie cousin's crafting skill.
